title: FS: Low Grade T206 Lot - All Cards $8-$20

posts.post_title: FS: Low Grade T206 Lot - All Cards $8-$20
posts.post_content:
Hello.  I have the following T206 lot available.  As you can see by the scans, all cards are low grade, most with serious condition problems, and are priced accordingly.  Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards.  3 or more ship for free.  Payment via any method you prefer.  Please e-mail me at [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] or send me a PM to reserve any cards or with questions.  Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED:
Take the entire remaining lot (3 cards for $35) or:

Congalton - $15
Egan - $12
Lavender - $12
